caseStudies.title: Automated 80% of Customer Support with AI
caseStudies.summary: Reduced support costs by 75% while improving CSAT scores by 15% through intelligent AI automation.
caseStudies.challenge: TechStyle was drowning in 50,000+ monthly support tickets with response times exceeding 48 hours and customer satisfaction declining rapidly.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented an AI-powered support system using GPT-4 and custom models to handle order inquiries, returns, and FAQs automatically.
caseStudies.timeline: 6 weeks from pilot to full deployment
results: Saved $1.1M annually in support costs
Scaled to handle Black Friday volume without adding staff
Improved first-contact resolution from 45% to 89%
Reduced customer churn by 12%

testimonial.quote: OptAImum didn't just automate our support—they transformed it. We're now handling 3x the volume with half the team, and customers are happier than ever.
testimonial.author: Sarah Chen
testimonial.title: VP of Customer Experience

caseStudies.title: Accelerated Sales Velocity by 40% with AI RevOps
caseStudies.summary: Transformed revenue operations with AI-driven lead scoring, routing, and automation, increasing pipeline velocity and reducing CAC.
caseStudies.challenge: DataSync's sales team was wasting 70% of time on admin tasks, leads were poorly qualified, and the sales cycle was stretching to 90+ days.
caseStudies.solution: Built an AI-powered RevOps system that scores leads, automates outreach, generates proposals, and provides real-time coaching to sales reps.
results: Generated $3.2M in additional revenue in 6 months
Reduced CAC by 40% through better targeting
Increased rep productivity by 3.5x
Improved forecast accuracy to 92%

testimonial.quote: The AI RevOps system OptAImum built is like having a team of 10 operations analysts working 24/7. Our sales team can finally focus on selling.
testimonial.author: Michael Torres
testimonial.title: Chief Revenue Officer

caseStudies.title: Built HIPAA-Compliant AI Data Pipeline Processing 10M Records Daily
caseStudies.summary: Created a secure, scalable data pipeline that reduced processing time by 95% while maintaining 100% HIPAA compliance.
caseStudies.challenge: MedTech was manually processing patient data across 50 systems, taking 48 hours for reports with 15% error rates and compliance risks.
caseStudies.solution: Designed and implemented an AI-powered data pipeline with automated quality checks, anomaly detection, and real-time processing capabilities.
results: Achieved 100% HIPAA compliance with zero violations
Reduced operational costs by $325K annually
Enabled real-time clinical decision support
Scaled to handle 100x data volume without additional resources

testimonial.quote: OptAImum delivered what three other vendors couldn't—a truly scalable, compliant data pipeline. We're now making decisions on real-time data instead of 2-day-old reports.
testimonial.author: Dr. Emily Rodriguez
testimonial.title: Chief Data Officer

caseStudies.title: Reduced Inventory Costs by 35% with AI Demand Forecasting
caseStudies.summary: Implemented AI-driven inventory optimization that reduced stockouts by 60% while cutting carrying costs by millions.
caseStudies.challenge: Urban Outfitters was losing $15M annually to stockouts and excess inventory, with manual forecasting accuracy below 60%.
caseStudies.solution: Deployed a custom AI system that analyzes 200+ signals to predict demand, optimize inventory levels, and automate reordering across 500+ stores.
caseStudies.timeline: 12 weeks from pilot to full rollout
results: Saved $15.7M in inventory carrying costs
Increased revenue by $8.5M from reduced stockouts
Improved gross margins by 4.2 percentage points
Reduced manual planning effort by 85%

testimonial.quote: The AI system OptAImum built is magic. We're selling more with less inventory, and our buyers can focus on strategy instead of spreadsheets.
testimonial.author: James Park
testimonial.title: SVP of Merchandising

caseStudies.title: Stopped 94% of Fraud with Real-Time AI Detection
caseStudies.summary: Built a real-time fraud detection system that reduced fraud losses by 94% while maintaining a 0.02% false positive rate.
caseStudies.challenge: NeoBank was losing $2M monthly to fraud with their rule-based system catching only 40% of fraudulent transactions and blocking legitimate users.
caseStudies.solution: Implemented a real-time AI fraud detection system using ensemble models that analyze 500+ features in <50ms per transaction.
results: Saved $23M in fraud losses in first year
Reduced manual review team by 70%
Improved customer experience with fewer false blocks
Achieved regulatory compliance for AI decision-making

testimonial.quote: OptAImum's fraud detection system paid for itself in the first month. We're now confident scaling our user base knowing fraud is under control.
testimonial.author: Lisa Wang
testimonial.title: Chief Risk Officer
